Package org.neo4j.internal.kernel.api

Interface AutoCloseablePlus

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Cursor, NodeCursor, NodeIndexCursor, NodeLabelIndexCursor, NodeValueIndexCursor, PropertyCursor, RelationshipIndexCursor, RelationshipScanCursor, RelationshipTraversalCursor, RelationshipTypeIndexCursor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachingExpandInto, CachingExpandInto.ExpandIntoSelectionCursor, CachingExpandInto.FromCachedSelectionCursor, Cursors.EmptyTraversalCursor, DefaultCloseListenable, DefaultComparatorSortTable, DefaultComparatorTopTable, DefaultNodeCursor, DefaultNodeLabelIndexCursor, DefaultNodeValueIndexCursor, DefaultPropertyCursor, DefaultRelationshipCursor, DefaultRelationshipIndexCursor, DefaultRelationshipScanCursor, DefaultRelationshipTraversalCursor, DefaultRelationshipTypeIndexCursor, DistinctSet, DoNothingCloseListenable, EagerBuffer, FullAccessNodeCursor, FullAccessNodeLabelIndexCursor, FullAccessNodeValueIndexCursor, FullAccessPropertyCursor, FullAccessRelationshipScanCursor, FullAccessRelationshipTraversalCursor, HeapTrackingOrderedAppendMap, IndexCursor, LongProbeTable, MemoryTrackingHeap, NodeValueIndexCursor.Empty, ProbeTable, StubNodeCursor, StubNodeLabelIndexCursor, StubNodeValueIndexCursor, StubPropertyCursor, StubRelationshipCursor, TraceableCursor
    public interface AutoCloseablePlus
extends AutoCloseable
    Enriches AutoCloseable with isClosed(). This method can be used to query whether a resource was closed or to make sure that it is only closed once.

    Also provides ability to register a listener for when this is closed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void close()  
      void closeInternal()
      Same as close(), but invoked before the listener has been notified.
      int getToken()
      Retrieves the token associated with the AutoCloseable
      boolean isClosed()

      Assigns a token to the AutoCloseable that can be used to as an index for faster lookups.
